string.name: asus_wifi_skipped_message
string.description: Text warning about skipping Wi-Fi with a mobile connect

resources.string: WARNING: if you skip WLAN, your device will only use cellular data for initial downloads and updates. To avoid possible data charges, connect to WLAN.

string.name: asus_wifi_and_mobile_skipped_message
string.description: Text warning about skipping Wi-Fi without a mobile connect

resources.string: WARNING: If you skip WLAN, your device won\'t have an Internet connection to use for any initial downloads or updates.
The device was unable to connect to this WLAN network.
If you restrict background cellular data, some apps and services won\'t work unless you\'re connected to WLAN.\n\nThis setting affects all users on this device.
